TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Niger, title = Niger, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Niger} }

S.FORM: Niger hya' ga cyux maki' tay 16 00 N, 8 00 E na Xweco syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 1.267 million sq km (maki' tay 22ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 1,266,700 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 300 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 18,638,600. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 35.10% , lhlahuy hya' ga 1%, sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 63.90%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Niamey. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 18 na tay mawpuw sazing byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Mahamadou Issoufou, aring ryax 7 squ byacing tay 4 sa kawas 2011 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' CIA 外交部

Niger hya' ga cyox maki' tay 16 00 N, 8 00 E na Xweco syow. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 1.267 million sq km (maki' tay 22ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 1,266,700 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilong hya' ga 300 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' sqoliq hya' ga 18,638,600. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahon hya' ga 35.10% , lhlahoy hya' ga 1%, sni' naha' sa pptzyowaw sa bzinah hya' ga 63.90%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' kraho' qalang hya' ga Niamey. snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' hya' ga 18 na tay mawpow sazing byacing na qotox kawas. mrhow Kokka' mrhow Kokka' ta' misow hya' ga Mahamadoo Issoofoo, aring ryax 7 sqo byacing tay 4 sa kawas 2011 lga, mosa' spazyang balay ms'rox kya la. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' CIA 外交部
